Articles.Content: Hi, I looked the forums and found out all time warp mods I found are for 1.7.2 or earlier, is there any such mods which works in 1.7.3?

1 hour ago, Space Nerd said:

Hi, I looked the forums and found out all time warp mods I found are for 1.7.2 or earlier, is there any such mods which works in 1.7.3?

Have you tried any of the mods you have found? Most mods written for 1.4 or later work fine in the latest versions of KSP. Very little in the game changes in a way that breaks older mods with each new release. There are exceptions. So, if you find a mod you are interested in, check the forum thread for that mod. Usually someone asks "Does X work in KSP 1.X.x" within minutes of a new release or you will find people complaining if it actually doesn't work.

Less than half of my 110 mods are specifically stated as compatible for 1.7.3. The oldest dates to 1.3.
